items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t seem to be interested in going anywhere.
Tom is one of the most handsome guys I\'ve ever seen.
Tom took care of Mary\'s dog while she was in Boston.
She ran very fast to catch up with the other members.
Tom decided to tell Mary the truth about his illness.
Tom has grown old and can\'t cut the mustard anymore.
Tom thinks he knows who Mary\'s favorite musician is.
Tom loves music more than anything else in the world.
Tom made it back to Boston just before the storm hit.
You\'re the only person I know who doesn\'t eat meat.
